lyrics.stanza: Take time to receive Him—the blessing's outpoured, And we may obtain it by reading His Word; We bask in the splendour of His healing light, And light becomes life, as in Him we delight.
Take time to absorb Him, to gain the supply, That we may be watered and nourished thereby; The deeper the roots spread, the deeper the flow, And richer and higher within us He'll grow.
Take time to enjoy Him, our portion is He: Our present, available reality; Our practical, real, and enjoyable Lord Is everything to us through His living Word.
Take time to behold Him, gaze oft on His face, Receiving His Person, and grace upon grace. By His pleasant shining, infused we will be; Our faces will glow with His light, radiantly.
